Meeting API¶

Meeting manipulation API

class api.views.meeting.MeetingViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

Inherits standard characteristics from ModelViewSet:

Endpoint: /meetings/
Methods: GET / POST / PUT / PATCH / DELETE / OPTIONS
Permissions:
- Default : IsConcernedByMeeting
- GET : IsJWTAuthenticated
Notes:
- GET response restricted to ‘Meeting’ objects linked with user
accept_meeting(request, pk=None)[source]¶

Accept a meeting

permission: IsConcernedByMeeting and Not meeting creator
endpoint: /meetings/{id}/accept_meeting/
method: POST
attr:
None
http return:
- 200 OK
- 401 Unauthorized
- 403 Forbidden
- 404 Not Found
data return:
- Modified meeting object
other actions:
None
model¶

alias of Meeting

refuse_meeting(request, pk=None)[source]¶

Validate a meeting

permission: IsConcernedByMeeting and Not meeting creator
endpoint: /meetings/{id}/refuse_meeting/
method: POST
attr:
None
http return:
- 200 OK
- 401 Unauthorized
- 403 Forbidden
- 404 Not Found
data return:
- Modified meeting object
other actions:
None
validate_meeting(request, pk=None)[source]¶

Validate a meeting

permission: IsConcernedByMeeting
endpoint: /meetings/{id}/validate_meeting/
method: POST
attr:
None
http return:
- 200 OK
- 401 Unauthorized
- 403 Forbidden
- 404 Not Found
data return:
- Modified meeting object
other actions:
None
